channel.title: Internet Explorer only (no install) Metasequioa!
channel.description:
This is a version of metasequioa made by me for users who don't want to download it. just visit my shortened link http://bit.ly/dBHlZJ is the link to visit this site (my website)
Requirements for use
> Windows Computer > Internet Explorer
this is merely in the beta stage, please tell me what else you would like to see happen.
THIS IS NOT AN ADVERTISEMENT AS THE LINK IS SHORTENED TO AVOID IT.

item.title: Internet Explorer only (no install) Metasequioa!
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

thnx coon i was going to post that, and yes i’m about to enter a partnership with the creators of webgamebuilder to make more of these

@ claunchii, it takes only 3 seconds to load on my old xp i don’t see how it’s long to load unless your computer has a lagg problem.
@ coon, just use the arrow keys and enter works for me everytime with 64bit IE8.

Read full topic

item.title: Internet Explorer only (no install) Metasequioa!
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

It took me less time to download it than to open it with a web browser lol. Other than that its good for people who have overloads of downlaods and dont want to downlaod or arent allowed to download. Nice

Read full topic

item.title: Internet Explorer only (no install) Metasequioa!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:3, topic:367880”][quote author=the wanderer link=topic=464026.msg3394282#msg3394282 date=1289185003]
Make a mozilla version.
[/quote][/quote]
He only used a web-game-builder. Not really something he can make a different version of. FYI - Cant change language, try making it auto-choose english

EDIT - Use this plugin for firefox to run this.
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/10909/

Just right click on link, and choose “open link in IE Tab Plus” > “switch rendering engine”. Only changes the rendering engine for THAT tab only, no worries.

Read full topic
